title: Turkey Unplugged
inclusions_evidence: Accommodation: 9 nights 4 star and special class hotels
Travel by private air-conditioned tourism vehicles
Airport arrival transfer on day 1 of tour and departure transfer at set times

other.notes: DIY costs for meals, sightseeing, and transfers are not provided.

reasoning: The deal offers a comprehensive package with accommodation, meals, and guided tours, but lacks specific DIY pricing for accurate comparison.
